fragment.title: Fragment of Avandra
fragment.fluff: The power of Avandra allows you to ensure that no bonds can hold your allies for long
fragment.benefit: When an ally adjacent to you makes a saving throw against an effect that includes the slowed, immobilized, or restrained condition, the ally rolls two saving throws and takes the better result.

manifestation.trigger: You use a divine encounter or daily attack power
manifestation.effect: You grant one ally adjacent to the target of the triggering attack a saving throw.
If the saving throw is against an effect that includes the slowed, immobilized, or restrained condition, the ally rolls two saving throws and takes the better result.

fragment.title: Fragment of Bahamut
fragment.fluff: Your ire against any who defy the common good fills you and provides you or your allies with additional protection against your foes
fragment.benefit: While all your encounter attack powers are expended, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses.

manifestation.trigger: You use a divine encounter or daily attack power
manifestation.effect: You or one ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
To gain the benefit, you or the chosen ally must be adjacent to a target of the triggering attack.
